title: Starpokerunion
author: Starpokerunion
content: Pokerplayers looking to get staked in online poker via cryptoWe are looking for poker players who want to get staked in cash games and tournaments.To be considered please send a message to @pokernutz on telegram . Include username in online pokersites including sharkscope and other methods to show your skill level . We need 10 individuals ti be added to our team . All deals will be closed via crypto and via telegram , ty

comments.author: batang_bitcoin
comments.body: You already made this post on the Services. If you're going to pay bitcoin, close this thread on gambling and keep the thread on the Services open. But you have to choose one on them on which you're going to open the thread for, there's no need for two threads open because that will go against the forum rules.Quote from: mprep on July 21, 2014, 05:27:51 PM12. No duplicate posting in multiple boards (except for re-posting topics in the local language boards if they're translated and re-posting marketplace topics in the altcoin boards if altcoins are accepted).
